title: Overboard
description: Doom guy has taken a holiday from hell, but it turns into the holiday from hell. This is 6 maps of island-hopping mayhem for Doom 2 (boom format, complevel 9). These maps are small but reasonably violent. Difficulty is average, but expect the usual mayhem. After the 6 maps there is a "game over" map, and beyond that lies "new game plus", which lets you play the same adventure again on a harder difficulty.
